journals.notes:
I tried this out in vanilla ET as well, but the same problem occurs. I tried to disable SLI technology, but still no luck. I'm pretty much clueless of the source of the problem. My only guesses are, a videocard problem or Win 8.1.

-*S

I finally found the cause of this, at least to the problem where the texts disappear in the fullscreen console. When you put on your lagometer the problem starts occuring.

-*S

So, I made more ecperiments and now I can say that the lagometer isn't affected here. I got the latest build and deleted my etconfig.cfg to make sure that none of the set controls or settings were making this problem occur. I went striaght away to the "Controls" and set console to full screen, texts dissappeared, same when I went to "View". I restarted my client. Tried the same again and no problems occured. So this problem is occuring inconsistently.

So after a further thinking I have listed below some facts about the current issue:

- This problem occured back in Windows 7 64-bit in vanilla ET
- This problem occurs in Windows 8.1 64-bit ET:L and vanilla ET
- SLI isn't causing the problem
- Problem occurs inconsistently

-*S

I spotted something new again. In mainmenu, when you open console and scroll to the point where you see the text disappearing like in "console001" screenshot and continuing in "console002" screenshot, you also notice scrollbar disappearing. In "console003" always at the same point the scrollbar appears again and all the texts can be seen again.

-*S
Closed. Since 2.71rc4 the console has been reworked. Console buffer itself is increased. See #830.

subject: Disappearing texts in console and settings menu in-game
description:
There is a bug that causes some texts to disappear by unknown reason.
In main menu everything works perfectly, I couldn't get any texts disappear whatever I did.
After going to the ET: Legacy server I went to the "Controls" menu. It was after a certain amount of time I was playing and I noticed that many of the texts were just disappearing all by sudden. I tried some other menus like "View" and the same thing happened. I don't know what I did to make that happen but I couldn't reproduce it anymore.

But there was another thing I could reproduce and it was that after connecting to the ET: Legacy server I went into "Controls". Then I just pressed Alt+§ to get console on fullscreen. I saw letters and texts missing from the top of the console.

My operating system is Windows 8.1 Enterprise. And I was using the ET:L build from December 7th.

-*S
